title: Chapter 4311 - Chapter 4311: 4310 Core Chaos Sphere
body:
Chapter 4311 - Chapter 4311: 4310 Core Chaos Sphere

Chapter 4311: 4310 core chaos sphere

Translator: 549690339

Wang Xian had stayed in the area of the cross primordial spirit for a few years.

During these few years, he had searched the surroundings thoroughly.

He had even arrived in front of the god of elements a few times.

However, Wang Xian did not rashly approach the positions of the god of elements.

In these few years, he had reaped abnormally bountiful harvests.

Basically, he had already explored the periphery of the cross-shaped primordial spirit region.

He did not manage to get all the treasures.

In this region, there were more than a dozen areas where energy collided. There were also treasures such as the fragments of the god of elements in those areas. Moreover, there were quite a number of them.

However, these were not places that Wang Xian could approach.

As he was in a deeper position, Wang Xian could not approach them either.

However, he had gained a lot this time!

I have basically explored the outer perimeter. Should I go to the core to take a look

Wang Xian thought to himself.

The location of the core was extremely risky.

However, even if these ten elemental dragons were to die, the loss would not be too great

Wang Xian made a prompt decision and immediately controlled the ten elemental dragons to fly towards the core.

He approached it little by little to avoid some chaotic energy.

Very soon, an elemental god appeared in Wang Xian’s line of sight.

This was the elemental god of fire attribute which was emitting a huge amount of fire attribute energy.

Wang Xian could not get close to this elemental god. Once he got close to it, the blazing flames would burn it to ashes.

After deviating from the elemental god of fire attribute, Wang Xian continued to fly in.

“That’s the god of metal element over there.”

After avoiding the god of fire element, Wang Xian saw the god of metal element very quickly.

The two god of elements were not close to each other.

There were many terrifying impact zones in the middle of the two god of elements.

The energy there was not completely fused.

Flames and golden rays were extremely violent!

Wang Xian searched for a few days before he found a relatively safe place and continued flying forward.

After he passed through the area where the flames and golden rays were violent, he traveled for an hour.

The scene in front of him shocked him.

In front of him, there was an extremely calm sea surface.

Yes, it was very calm and quiet. There was no energy fluctuation at all!

The entire area, which was close to the Elemental God, was the color of the Elemental God.

It was like the red color of the flames and the gold color of the metal attribute.

The deeper one went, the grayish color of the chaos.

It was grayish, as if the apocalypse had not arrived yet. That grayish energy.

Wang Xian looked at it and his face was filled with astonishment.

He could vaguely see that the elemental gods in the distance were emitting a luster.

The ten elemental gods seemed to have completed a circle.

In front of him was the center of the circle. It was a peaceful area.

“What’s going on? Why is the center area so peaceful? Furthermore, it has formed a gray energy. This… ? ?”

“This gray energy seems to have completely fused the ten attributes together.”

Wang Xian thought to himself.

Although there were also ten different attributes mixed together in the location outside.

However, this kind of fusion was the kind where metal, wood, water, fire, and earth were separated.

Various attributes were interwoven together.

The location in front of him seemed to be more than just energy interweaving together. It seemed to be completely fused, forming a new type of energy.

Wang Xian pondered in his heart. After hesitating for a moment, he moved his body and continued flying in.

His speed was very slow. He was afraid that something unexpected would happen.

After flying for an hour, he finally arrived in front of the gray energy.

Wang Xian extended his Dragon Claw and entered the gray energy.

Buzz

A deathly stillness was felt. This feeling was somewhat similar.

“This? This is the feeling of entering the chaos before the Apocalypse.”

Wang Xian thought to himself.

The gray energy was filled with deathly stillness. He couldn’t absorb any energy from it.

Wang Xian extended his entire body into it.

This feeling was exactly the same as when he entered the chaos back then!

“What’s going on? Ten attributes fused together to form the deathly stillness energy of the Chaos?”

Wang Xian’s face was filled with astonishment.

He moved his body and entered the dead dead energy.

A powerhouse who was at the peak of the Dominator realm could enter this place.

It was just that he couldn’t live for too long!

However, there was no problem for him to survive for a few years.

Wang Xian entered the place and scanned his surroundings.

It was Gray and dead silent. There was no energy fluctuation at all.

There was nothing in there either.

He continued to fly deeper and deeper, wanting to explore this place.

Everything in the core was full of astonishment.

Could it be that the core of the cross-shaped primordial spirit region was like this?

He kept driving and driving.

Wang Xian felt that he had been driving for a very, very long time, but he still hadn’t reached the end.

This made him a little surprised.

What was going on?

For example, with the range of the ten elemental gods, he should have reached the end long ago and flown to the position of the other elemental god.

But Now?

Was it because of the spatial attribute of the elemental god that made this area look small, but there was a huge space inside?

Wang Xian guessed as he continued to fly in.

Following that, Wang Xian continued to fly forward.

Year after year passed. Just when Wang Xian thought he couldn’t fly to the end, something suddenly appeared in front of him. Wang Xian was shocked.

There, there was a ball in Wang Xian’s line of sight.

The ball was about 10 meters in size. It was filled with the aura of death and vitality.

This was a very peculiar feeling.

Death and vitality were contained on the same item at the same time.

Wang Xian’s eyes glowed as he flew over immediately.

To be able to exist in this space, it must be a rare and powerful treasure.

It might even be an existence on the level of the ultimate treasure of the Heaven’s origin.

Wang Xian approached the ball and came to a hundred meters away from it. He sized it up quietly.

“No matter what it is, I must get rid of it!”

Wang Xian couldn’t figure out what was going on. He went straight to the ball and prepared to take it away.

The Dragon Claw reached out and landed on it.

However, in the next moment, Wang Xian felt an extremely powerful devouring force.

This devouring force wanted to engulf him into the interior of the ball.

Wang Xian’s expression changed slightly and he hurriedly tried to defend himself.

However, the devouring force of this sphere was too terrifying. It was not something that he, who was at the peak of the Dominator realm, could withstand.

Buzz

In the next instant, Wang Xian felt his body being sucked into the sphere.

Following that, his consciousness was slowly absorbed by the sphere as though he had fused with it.

However, in less than two seconds, his consciousness was completely destroyed and he was dead!

Wang Xian, who was outside the cross primordial spirit region, sensed all of this and his gaze focused!
